required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Yimitasvir Phosphate Capsule in Subjects With Normal Renal Function and ESRD
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Non-randomized, Open-Label, Single-Dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of Yimitasvir Phosphate Capsule in Subjects With Normal Renal Function and End-stage Renal Disease Without Hemodialysis

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the single-dose pharmacokinetics (PK) and safety of Yimitasvir phosphate capsule in participants with End-stage renal disease without hemodialysis using matched healthy participants as a control group.

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma pharmacokinetics (PK) parameters of DAG181 as measured by AUC
primary_outcome.description: AUC is defined as the concentration of drug area under the curve

primary_outcome.measure: Plasma pharmacokinetics (PK) parameters of DAG181 as measured by Cmax
primary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the maximum concentration of drug

secondary_outcome.description: The incidence of adverse events will be summarized

arm_group.description: Participants with End-stage renal disease will receive a single dose of Yimitasvir Phosphate Capsule.
Participants with normal renal function will receive a single dose of Yimitasvir Phosphate Capsule.

intervention.description: DAG181 100 mg (100 mg Capsule) administered orally

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
